column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Yesterday , my bike tire popped while I was riding it .
#text=I had to walk 45 min home to get it fixed .
#text=I had tried riding it with a flat tire , but the bike dragged on the cement and I did n't have the man power to turn the wheels .
#text=When , I got home I asked my father for help .
#text=We inflated the tire a little with a mechanical pump .
#text=You grab the pump with two hands , pull the lever up and then push down with your whole body weight .
#text=We put the tire underwater to find where bubbles were coming out to find the hole .
#text=After we found the hole , we dried the tire and sprayed a rubber sealant to the tire to seal the hole .
#text=Then , I got on it to see if it worked .
#text=After a day or so , I rode it again to make sure the tire was n't deflating .
